title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 96.2 - Post-season filing requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 96.2 - Post-season filing requirements

State Regulations

Every licensee shall file with the Department of Taxation
and Finance, within 10 days after the close of each race meeting, classified
lists of the holders of all passes, badges and cards of admission to such race
meeting, disposed of otherwise than by sale, including all tax-free passes, badges or cards issued pursuant to rules or regulation of the State Racing and

Wagering Board, and showing any official position, membership or employment
held by any person listed, by reason or which such a pass, badge or card was
issued to him. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
96.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
